LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.questDescriptionRules.rulesSt:
questDescription->[asker_nameFull], a [asker_royalTitleInCurrentFaction] of [asker_faction_name] is calling from nearby. [asker_possessive] guards were killed in an ambush. [asker_pronoun] escaped, but is now being followed by (*Threat)a manhunting [animalKindDef_label](/Threat).

[asker_nameDef] wants you to keep [asker_objective] safe at [map_definite] for a few hours until [asker_possessive] shuttle can come pick [asker_objective] up. 
[asker_pronoun] will bestow [royalFavorReward] [asker_faction_royalFavorLabel] on whoever accepts this quest. This is enough [asker_faction_royalFavorLabel] to receive the royal title of Yeoman, and all benefits that come with it - including the first level of psychic powers.
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.root.nodes.3.name: royalFavorReward
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.root.nodes.8.name: points
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.root.nodes.10.node.nodes.4.te: The shuttle has arrived to collect [asker_nameDef].
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.root.nodes.14.node.nodes.0.te: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has died. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.root.nodes.15.node.nodes.0.te: Unauthorized, violating surgery has been performed on {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect. Because of this violation, [asker_pronoun] will now attempt to leave. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.root.nodes.16.node.nodes.0.te: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to host, has been arrested. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.root.nodes.17.node.nodes.0.te: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has left the designated settlement. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.root.nodes.18.node.nodes.0.te: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has run wild. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.root.nodes.19.node.nodes.0.te: The shuttle sent to collect [asker_nameDef] has been destroyed. [asker_pronoun] will now leave on foot. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.root.nodes.22.node.nodes.0.te: The shuttle sent to collect [asker_nameDef] has departed without [asker_objective]. [asker_pronoun] will now leave on foot. [failLetterEndingCommon]
